section.name: Charyss Willow
section.p: Trained in reciting the great epics of history, Charyss lives her life as if she were a heroine in an epic of her own. One day, troubadours will sing of her as the greatest bard that ever lived. She has heard tale of a wizard, imprisoned in a citadel of glowing red stone. Perhaps she will gain fame by freeing him.
You can play as Charyss, or as a troubadour with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
